## ``hc_theme_monokai``
Monokai theme for highcharts

#### Description 

A well know text editor theme

#### Usage

<pre><code>
hc_theme_monokai(...)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* ``...``: Named argument to modify the theme

###Examples

```{r}`
highcharts_demo() %>%
  hc_add_theme(hc_theme_monokai())
```
